data:
A Abueshareik, A Katbeh - 2025

DevSecOps pipelines, and detecting security vulnerabilities early in development is 
critical to maintaining a secure codebase. Objective: This study conducts a 
benchmarking evaluation to compare large language model (LLM)-based security 
scanning against static application security testing (SAST) using SonarQube to
